name: Final Day
description:
Synopsis

On the day when God lost hope in mankind, He sent Satama to wash away the world. Raphael was born to disbelieve in God's command.

Therefore descended from heaven To help save humanity.

How to play

Try to keep the Player and Tower away from Enemy attacks or GameOver will run out of time.

Until the last side That is, the third side must fight with the Boss and the Tower at the same time.

Control button

WASD = walk

Left-click = shoot

space = Jump

Skill

Right-click = skill1:Increase fire rate speed.

E = skill2:Laser

Q = skill3:Enlarge one bullet to a large size.

While using a skill, you cannot use any other skill until the cooldown is complete.

Enemy

Black = attack Player:Damage 5

Black2 = attack Tower:Damage 5

White = range attack Tower:Damage 3

Boss = range attack Player:Damage 10

The team members who created this work

Akapon Khuadkaew
